name: Cluster Madforce
description:
The new free Version of Cluster with many Updates! Developed by Game_District and GalaxyCrafted.

Game Modes:

✓ Deathmatch

✓ Team Deathmatch

✓ Gun Game

✓ Domination

✓ All game modes have full bot support

✓ Multi-Team support (more than two teams)

✓ Single-player and COOP

Weapon System Features:

✓ Raycast Shooting

✓ Physical Bullet Shooting

✓ Bullet Penetration

✓ Fire Modes: Semi, Auto, Burst

✓ Melee

✓ Grenades

✓ Left Hand IK

Gameplay Features:

✓ Player Based Bots

✓ Leveling / Unlocking

✓ Third Person Mode

✓ Assist System

UI Features:

✓ Room Browser

✓ Pre-Game Lobby

✓ Minimap

World Features:

✓ Ammo Spawn

✓ Weapon Spawn

✓ Health Pack Spawn

✓ Kill and Damage Zones

✓ Leaving Combat Area-Zones

✓ Explodeable barrels

Other Features:

✓ Voice Chat

✓ Editor Tool for adding player models

✓ Basic Statistic System

✓ Object pooling for impacts, shells and bullets
